Events that occurred on 31 March.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1979 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Scholar and Storyteller is published.
2006 - The Lord of the Rings 1954-2004: Scholarship in Honor of Richard E. Blackwelder is published.
2008 - Tolkien's Gedling is published.
2008 - Stormfront Studios, developers of the 2002 video game The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, ceases trading.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: Note: Months of the Shire Calendar only have 30 days, so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.
